definitions: willingness to take risks and act innovatively; confidence or courage

examples.text: the boldness and independence that characterized his leadership
a president who is showing incredible boldness in going after the cartels

shortDefinitions: willingness to take risks and act innovatively

definitions: confidence to an impudent or presumptuous degree

examples.text: they had the boldness to mock a man who had served his country
you will overlook my boldness, I hope

shortDefinitions: confidence to impudent or presumptuous degree

definitions: the quality of having a strong, vivid, or clear appearance

examples.text: the boldness of the hues are very startling
these works display a great boldness of forms

shortDefinitions: quality of having strong, vivid, or clear appearance
